registration_means_that_you_agree: Registration means that you agree to 〇〇's User agreement & User privacy.
show_icon_badge_for_new_sesions: Show icon badge for new sessions
please_choose_seed_phrase: Please choose Seed Phrase in order and make sure your Seed Phrase was correct written, once forgotten, it cannot be recovered.
write_down_your_seed_phrase: Write down your Seed Phrase in the correct order on paper
do_not_create_a_digitalcopy: Do not create a digitalcopy such as a screenshot, text file, or email.
the_network_you_have_selected: The network you have selected is Avalanche. Please ensure that the withdrawal address supports the Avalanche network. You will lose your assets if the chosen platform does not support retrievals.
you_have_already_created_a_wallet_addres: You have already created a wallet address. if you want to create a new wallet, please verify and continue.
import_a_wallet_using_seed_phrase: Import a wallet using Seed Phrase
enter_the_seed_phrase_word: Enter the Seed Phrase word and separate with space
your_12_word_seed_phrase: Your 12-word Seed Phrase is the ONLY way to recover your funds if you lose access to your wallet.
keep_your_assets_safe: Keep your assets safe by enabling passcode protection
overwite_your_current_mobile_wallet: Overwrite your current Mobile wallet using a Seed Phrase
allow_to_record_sleep_sounds: Allow 〇〇 to Record Sleep Sounds
allow_to_access_healthcare_data: Allow 〇〇 to Access Healthcare Data
allow_to_access_motion_data: Allow 〇〇 to Access Motion Data
screen_may_be_locked_or_unlocked: Screen may be locked or unlocked
keep_phone_charged_through_the_night: Keep phone charged through the night
place_phone_slightly_off_the_edge_of_you: Place phone slightly off the edge of your nightstand
align_phone_height_to_your_chest: Align phone height to your chest
place_phone_about_an_arm_length_away: Place phone about an arm's length away
point_base_of_phone_towards_your_body: Point base of phone towards your body
the_closer_user_are_to_the_time: The closer users are to the time set in the ALARM, the more tokens users will receive. Inversely, the further away from the time, the fewer tokens they will receive.
to_maximize_the_number_of_tokens: To maximize the number of tokens users will receive, users need to get up within 10 minutes before or after the ALARM time.
show_contract_visit_snowtrace: Show Contract / Visit Snowtrace to see contract
do_you_really_want_to_deposit: Do you really want to deposit xxx 〇〇?
do_you_really_want_to_withdraw: Do you really want to withdraw xxx 〇〇?
do_you_really_want_to_compound: Do you really want to compound xxx 〇〇?
caution_seed_phrase: Caution: Please check your seed phrase in the backup of your settings, write it down on a piece of paper, and store it in a safe place. You are required to enter the seed phrase when you want to restore your wallet.
to_track_ambient_noise_levels_and_sounds: To track ambient noise levels and sounds that occur while you're asleep, access to your phone's mic is required.
microphone_records_only_when_tracking: Microphone records only when tracking has begun.
recorded_audio: Recorded audio is stored only in your phone.
to_allow_access_to_healthcare_data: To allow access to healthcare data is important to accurately measure sleep quality.
sleep_quality_will_derectly_affect: Sleep quality will directly affect the amount of tokens to be distributed.
the_data_would_access_will_only: The data 〇〇 would access will only be used to measure sleep quality.
to_allow_access_to_motion_data_is_inport: To allow access to motion data is important to accurately measure sleep quality.
the_data_would_acquire_will_only: The data 〇〇 would acquire will only be used to measure sleep quality.
would_like_to_send_you_notifications: 〇〇 would like to send you notifications
notification_may_include_alert_sound_and: Notification may include alerts, sounds, and icon badges. These can be configured in Settings.
